item.title: CISSP Cleared at 106 questions!
item.description: I passed the Certified Information Systems Security Professional(CISSP) and became an Associate of (ISC)2 on November 29th, 2019. Background: MS in Cybersecurity; BE - Computer Engineering 1 year of consulting experience; Security+; CEH v9; Study Approach 5 - 8 hours of studies per day Time : 3 months The Journey began… with the Sybex 8th Edition: Official study guide, making my notes along the way. This works best for me, I can remember more if I write down the concepts.
